title: Bernie Sanders Wants DOJ To Investigate 'Potential Fraud' By Exxon Over Climate Research
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Politics - Today 
WASHINGTON -- Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) on Tuesday joined a push for the Department of Justice to investigate allegations that ExxonMobil...
